divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the tv show HOUSE and an unusual bright light caught my eye I looked out the window and said no this can't be what I think it is but after continuing to watch my show the light did not go away so my camera was on the end table in the living room so finally I could not ignore the brightness and went out on the patio to look and I snapped a couple of photos and I began videoing the object however the screen on my patio prohibited any good video. I was using a kodak camera. This went on for about an hour and fifthteen minuets at which time it then started having red, yellow and green lights going round and round and then it became dimmer and just disappeared ( did not fly away ) just disappeared has never been there before this night and has not been back.
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa

This sighting has never been favorited.
